Question.Subject: Tumblr 'ask' page problem?
Question.Content:
Hi,
I'm trying to set up an 'ask' page. I've done everything it says like make the URL /ask
But I can't see anything on this page.
http://bryonie.tumblr.com/ask (that's the page, I think it's blank.)
So, any idea what has gone wrong? What is the html code for an ask box?
There isn't anything when I click html. So can you see the Ask Box? Or not?
Question.ChosenAnswer: its not blank for me. theres a picture at the top, the tumblr into @ the right, little text in bottom left. Something is done wrong. I suggest pasting html code on microsoft word and checking it piece by piece

Answer.Content: its not blank for me. theres a picture at the top, the tumblr into @ the right, little text in bottom left. Something is done wrong. I suggest pasting html code on microsoft word and checking it piece by piece

its not blank for me either
follow me, reblog me http://smokingfish.tumblr.com/
